mapper.select: SELECT A.INSP_ID AS inspId , A.INSP_SEQ AS inspSeq , A.INSP_NM AS inspNm , (SELECT COUNT(S1.INSP_ID) FROM wit_insp100t S , wit_insp100t S1 WHERE S.UPP_INSP_ID = A.INSP_ID AND S.INSP_LEVEL = '2' AND S.END_DATE = '99991231235959' AND S1.UPP_INSP_ID = S.INSP_ID AND S1.INSP_LEVEL = '3' AND S1.END_DATE = '99991231235959') AS inspDetlAllCnt , (SELECT COUNT(S.INSP_ID) FROM wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = A.INSP_ID AND S.CHECK_YN = 'Y' AND S.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo}) AS inspDetlChoiceCnt , (SELECT COUNT(S.INSP_ID) FROM wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = A.INSP_ID AND S.CHECK_YN = 'N' AND S.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo}) AS inspDetlNoCnt , A.INSP_IMG AS inspImg FROM wit_insp100t A WHERE A.END_DATE = '99991231235959' AND A.INSP_LEVEL = '1' ORDER BY A.INSP_SEQ

SELECT A.INSP_ID AS inspId , A.INSP_SEQ AS inspSeq , A.INSP_NM AS inspNm , A.UPP_INSP_ID AS uppInspId , (SELECT COUNT(S.INSP_ID) FROM wit_insp100t S , wit_insp300t S2 WHERE S.END_DATE = '99991231235959' AND S.INSP_LEVEL = '3' AND S.UPP_INSP_ID = A.INSP_ID AND S2.INSP_DETL_CD = S.INSP_ID AND S2.CHECK_YN = 'Y' AND S2.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo}) AS checkCnt FROM wit_insp100t A WHERE A.END_DATE = '99991231235959' AND A.INSP_LEVEL = '2' AND A.UPP_INSP_ID = #{inspId} ORDER BY A.INSP_SEQ

SELECT A.INSP_ID AS inspId , A.INSP_SEQ AS inspSeq , A.INSP_NM AS inspNm , A.INSP_COMT AS inspComt , A.INSP_IMG AS inspImg , IFNULL((SELECT CHECK_YN FROM wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = #{parentsInspId} AND S.INSP_DETL_CD = A.INSP_ID AND S.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo}), 'D') AS checkYn , IFNULL((SELECT CHECK_DATE FROM wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = #{parentsInspId} AND S.INSP_DETL_CD = A.INSP_ID AND S.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo}), NULL) AS checkDate , IFNULL((SELECT REPR_DATE FROM wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = #{parentsInspId} AND S.INSP_DETL_CD = A.INSP_ID AND S.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo}), NULL) AS reprDate , IFNULL((SELECT CHECK_COMT FROM wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = #{parentsInspId} AND S.INSP_DETL_CD = A.INSP_ID AND S.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo}), '') AS checkComt , IFNULL((SELECT CHECK_IMG1 FROM wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = #{parentsInspId} AND S.INSP_DETL_CD = A.INSP_ID AND S.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo}), NULL) AS checkImg1 , IFNULL((SELECT CHECK_IMG2 FROM wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = #{parentsInspId} AND S.INSP_DETL_CD = A.INSP_ID AND S.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo}), NULL) AS checkImg2 FROM wit_insp100t A WHERE A.UPP_INSP_ID = #{inspId} AND A.END_DATE = '99991231235959' AND A.INSP_LEVEL = '3' ORDER BY A.INSP_SEQ
SELECT COUNT(A.INSP_ID) AS noCnt FROM wit_insp300t A WHERE A.CHECK_YN = 'N' AND A.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo}

SELECT A.INSP_ID AS inspId , B.INSP_ID AS inspDetlId , B.INSP_NM AS inspNm , B.INSP_SEQ AS inspSeq , B.INSP_COMT AS inspComt , B.INSP_IMG AS inspImg , A.CHECK_YN AS checkYn , A.CHECK_DATE AS checkDate , A.REPR_DATE AS reprDate , A.CHECK_COMT AS checkComt , A.CHECK_IMG1 AS checkImg1 , A.CHECK_IMG2 AS checkImg2 FROM wit_insp300t A , wit_insp100t B WHERE A.CHECK_YN = 'Y' AND A.CRE_USER = #{loginClerkNo} AND B.INSP_ID = A.INSP_DETL_CD ORDER BY A.INSP_DETL_CD, B.INSP_SEQ
